original_text: And the men of Babylon made Succothbenoth, and the men of Cuth made Nergal, and the men of Hamath made Ashima,
korean_text: 바벨론 사람들은 숙곳브놋을 만들었고 굿 사람들은 네르갈을 만들었고 하맛 사람들은 아시마를 만들었고

sentences.original_text: And the men of Babylon made Succothbenoth
and the men of Cuth made Nergal
and the men of Hamath made Ashima
